location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting the translation of a letter without date, sent from Mahomed bin Nasir [Muhammad bin Nasser] to the Governor of Bombay, Sir Evan Nepean, regarding Nasir's claim on the factory inhabited by Henshaw at Bushire.
